Translations.Text: wo zhi yinggai jie zhenzhu de mingyi er xuanyan zhenli. Wo que yi cong nimen de zhu nali gei nimen dai laile yige mingzheng, suoyi, ni yinggai shifang yiselie de houyi, rang tamen tong wo yiqi li qu.
Ta shuo: Ruguo ni yi dai laile yi zhong jixiang, ni jiu ba ta na chulai ba, ruguo ni shi chengshi de ren.
Ta jiu pao xia ta de shouzhang, na tiao shouzhang huran bian cheng yitiao mang.
Ta chouchu ta de shou lai, na zhi shou zai guanzhong de yanqian huran xian chu baiguang.
Falao de baixing zhong de zhong lingxiu shuo: Zhe que shi 1 ge gaoming de shushi,
Falao de baixing zhong de zhong lingxiu shuo: Zhe que shi 1 ge gaoming de shushi,
tamen shuo: Qing ni kuanrong ta he ta gege, bing pai zhaomu yuan wang ge chengshi qu,
tamen hui ba suoyou gaoming de shushi dou zhao dao ni yuqian lai.
Shushimen lai jian falao, tamen shuo: Ruguo women huosheng, women hui dedao baochou ma?
Ta shuo: Shi de, nimen biding shuyu qinxin zhi lie.
Tamen shuo: Mu sa a! Ni xian pao (ni de shouzhang) ne, haishi women xian pao (women de) ne?
Ta shuo: Nimen xian pao ba! Dang tamen pao xiaqu shi,(bian chu de dashe) xuanhuole zhongren de yanjing, erqie shi renmen kongbu. Tamen shizhanle da moshu.
Wo qishi mu sa shuo: Ni pao chu ni de shouzhang ba. Yushi, na tiao shouzhang like xiaomiele tamen suo huanhua de (dashe).
Yushi, zhenli zhaozhu, er tamen suo yan de moshu bian cheng wuyong de.
Falao deng dangchang baibei,1 bian er wei quru zhe.
Shushimen bu youji de baidao xiaqu,
